title: Karlsten Cat Repellent Anti Fouling Granules, Natural Humane Cat Deterrent Citronella
features: ✅ Karlsten Cat Repellent Granules – Powerful Outdoor Cat Deterrent with Natural Citronella to Stop Cats Fouling Your Lawn & Garden

✅ Effective & Humane Cat Deterrent – Our citronella-based cat repellent granules naturally keep cats away from gardens, patios, driveways, and flower beds—preventing unwanted fouling and damage to plants.

✅ Long-Lasting Protection – These fast-acting anti-fouling granules create a strong scent barrier that masks territorial markings, discouraging cats from returning. For best results, apply consistently over two weeks.
✅ Easy & Safe to Use – Simply sprinkle our pet-friendly cat repellent around problem areas to create an invisible, protective barrier. Safe for plants, lawns, and outdoor spaces.
✅ Proven One-Step Solution – The powerful citronella formula repels cats naturally, making it an effective, non-toxic way to protect your outdoor space from unwanted feline visitors.
